channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Word
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Word

item.title: CVE-2018-0950|2024-08-05T03:44:11.695Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20word
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Office renders Rich Text Format (RTF) email messages containing OLE objects when a message is opened or previewed, aka "Microsoft Office Information Disclosure Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Word, Microsoft Office. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-1007.
